org.cyanogenmod.launcher.home.api.cards

Class PublishableCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cyanogenmod.launcher.home.api.cards.PublishableCard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CardData, CardDataImage

    public abstract class PublishableCard
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents any card that can be published to the host application, to be displayed to the user.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PublishableCard(CmHomeContract.ICmHomeContract contract)

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public long getId()

      • setAuthority

        public void setAuthority(java.lang.String authority)

      • getAuthority

        public java.lang.String getAuthority()

      • getGlobalId

        public java.lang.String getGlobalId()
        Retrieve a global identifier that is unique among all CardData objects on the device.
        Returns:
        A global ID String for this PublishableCard.

      • publish

        public void publish(android.content.Context context)
        Publish this PublishableCard to CM Home, to be immediately be displayed to the user. This operation is completed asynchronously. If this card has been previously published, it will be updated in place.
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the publishing application.

      • unpublish

        public boolean unpublish(android.content.Context context)
        Unpublishes a PublishableCard, removing it from CM Home immediately. The card can be republished at a later time, but will obtain a new ID and potentially a new position in CM Home.
        Parameters:
        context - A Context of the publishing application.
        Returns:
        true if the unpublish was successful, false otherwise.

      • isPublished

        public boolean isPublished(android.content.Context context)
        Has this card been published to the host application?
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the publishing application
        Returns:
        True if this card has been published.
